query.queryinfo: select [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.NodeName], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [UI.bug.keyword], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject] from WorkItems where [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' and ([System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\UIDeal_AWS' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\MR\uMR\UIDeal_AWS' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\CT\For HSW\UIDEAL' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\MI\SW\For HSW BU\UIDeal_AWS') and [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' and ([UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69_SP4]' or [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69SP4_H4]') and (not [UI.bug.keyword] contains 'wish' and not [UI.Reserved] contains 'Wish') and [System.NodeName] in ('Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Heart CT', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'Brain Perfusion_CT') and not [UI.bug.keyword] contains '[H4第二轮回归放行]' and [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] < @today and [System.State] in ('New', 'Assigned') and [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] <> '' and [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' order by [System.AreaPath]

select [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.AreaPath], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [System.CreatedDate], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject], [System.NodeName] from WorkItems where [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' and ([System.State] = 'Assigned' or [System.State] = 'New') and ([System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\UIDeal_AWS' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\MR\uMR\UIDeal_AWS' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\CT\For HSW\UIDEAL' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\MI\SW\For HSW BU\UIDeal_AWS') and [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' and (not [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69_SP4]' and not [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69SP4_R2]' and not [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69SP4_R3]' and not [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69SP4R2_F1]' and not [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69SP4_R1]' and not [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69SP4_H4]' and not [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_71]') and [System.CreatedDate] >= '2020-01-01T00:00:00.0000000' and [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject] contains '[HSW-uWS-CT]' and (not [UI.bug.keyword] contains '[0812Review]' and not [UI.bug.keyword] contains '[1111Review]' and not [UI.bug.keyword] contains '[1130Review]' and not [UI.bug.keyword] contains '[1023Review]' and not [UI.Reserved] contains '[0812Review]' and not [UI.Reserved] contains '[1111Review]' and not [UI.Reserved] contains '[1130Review]') and (not [UI.bug.keyword] contains 'wish' and not [UI.Reserved] contains 'wish') and [System.NodeName] in ('Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Heart CT', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'Brain Perfusion_CT') and [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' order by [System.AreaPath]

select [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.AreaPath], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.NodeName], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [UI.bug.keyword], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject] from WorkItems where [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' and ([System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\UIDeal_AWS' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\MR\uMR\UIDeal_AWS' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\CT\For HSW\UIDEAL' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\MI\SW\For HSW BU\UIDeal_AWS') and [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' and ([UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69_SP4]' or [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69SP4_H4]') and (not [UI.bug.keyword] contains 'wish' and not [UI.Reserved] contains 'Wish') and [System.NodeName] in ('Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Heart CT', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'Brain Perfusion_CT') and not [UI.bug.keyword] contains '[H4第二轮回归放行]' and [System.State] in ('New', 'Assigned') and [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] = '' order by [System.AreaPath]

select [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.AreaPath], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.NodeName], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [UI.bug.keyword], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject] from WorkItems where [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' and ([System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\UIDeal_AWS' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\MR\uMR\UIDeal_AWS' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\CT\For HSW\UIDEAL' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\MI\SW\For HSW BU\UIDeal_AWS') and [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' and ([UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69_SP4]' or [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69SP4_H4]') and (not [UI.bug.keyword] contains 'wish' and not [UI.Reserved] contains 'Wish') and [System.NodeName] in ('Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Heart CT', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'Brain Perfusion_CT') and [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate] >= @today and [System.State] in ('Resolved', 'Verified', 'Terminated', 'Closed') order by [System.AreaPath]
query.additionalqueryinfo: select [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.AreaPath], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.NodeName], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [UI.bug.keyword], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject] from WorkItems where [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' and ([System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\UIDeal_AWS' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\MR\uMR\UIDeal_AWS' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\CT\For HSW\UIDEAL' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\MI\SW\For HSW BU\UIDeal_AWS') and [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' and ([UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69_SP4]' or [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69SP4_H4]') and (not [UI.bug.keyword] contains 'wish' and not [UI.Reserved] contains 'Wish') and [System.NodeName] in ('Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Heart CT', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'Brain Perfusion_CT') and [System.CreatedDate] >= @today order by [System.AreaPath]
